teachers.bio: Fiona has a Bachelor of Arts. Some describe them as youthful. They have been known to say: Know how to listen, and you will profit even from those who talk badly.

programs.name: DND for Social Development
programs.description: This popular role playing game is a great way for teenagers that struggle with social cues, etiquette and interactions in general.

programs.name: Horse IQ
programs.description: Students will learn to take care of a horse and riding equipment while building lifelong connections with other teens and furry friends alike.

programs.name: Club Soccer
programs.description: Great for anyone that loves soccer from beginner to experienced. No try-outs, just come join and play.

teachers.bio: Erma has a Associate Degree in Criminology. Some describe them as grouchy. They have been known to say: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
Kay has a Bachelor of biomedical Science. Some describe them as unsure. They have been known to say: Dignity does not consist in possessing honors, but in deserving them.

programs.name: Debate Debacle
programs.description: Students will work on public speaking and reasoning under stress in a challenging but friendly environment.

teachers.bio: Art has a Bachelor of Forensic Science. Some describe them as irked. They have been known to say: Control thy passions lest they take vengence on thee.
